analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā.
analyzed: te bhikkhave sattā su parihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā

original: Te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharanti savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: te diṭṭhā iva dhamme dukkham viharanti sa vighātam sa upāyāsam sa pariḷāha

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā

original: Te, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā.
analyzed: te bhikkhave sattāḥ a parihīnāḥ ye ariyāya paññāya a parihīnā

original: Te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharanti avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: te diṭṭhā iva dhamme sukham viharanti avighātam an upāyāsam a pariḷāha

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhāti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
